column5: just wanted to know if anyone could point me in the right direction.  thanks in advance   Ryan
TRy Burns in Burlington.He has a 2 pack limit.
Shortwave Marine Electronics  Write a review 113 Lakeshore Road East Mississauga, ON L5G 1E2  (905) 278-6541â€Ž   They have whole or cut bait and supply some of the charters there as well. HINT!!
You may be able to find suitable baits in the frozen fish section at Food Basic's.
Awesome thats what I was looking for but couldnt get a addy from anyone.  thanks
Who buys cut bait?  Go to your local supermarket.  Are you fishing catfish or salmon?  Many supermakets sell frozen smelt and herring.  Asian supermarkets might be your best bet.
